summary: "Fur Collar" is a mod that adds a fur collar. You can wear it. It's a fur collar. Not suggested for use as a weapon or shield. Just put it around your neck for stylishness +1.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/MM7MnRP.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]A decorative clothing mod by Hothtrooper44.[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/4fvbP8P.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][color=orange]"Fur Collar" is a mod that adds a fur collar.
You can wear it.
It's a fur collar.
Not suggested for use as a weapon or shield.[/color][/b][/center]

This little mod adds two fur collars that are custom meshed, custom rigged and weight painted, and work on all races and both genders. There are two versions, one is tighter around the neck and one is a little looser and rests on the shoulders. They have custom ground models. They are craftable with no perks required in the misc section of a forge and have no stats. They use slot 46 on your character, so they will be wearable with all of your armor and cloak mods that I know of.

Some friends of mine insisted that people would enjoy this little mod and that I should release it. I was not planning to but since they insisted, here it is! I may make some color variations if this mod actually gets some use.

[center][youtube]6-68a2ZRLgs[/youtube]
[color=orange]I make my own videos now! Feel free to subscribe to my youtube channel where I always post a video before I release a mod. =)[/color][/center]

[center]Feedback should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and additions![/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qJykHcg.png[/img][/center]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/cdEoIUx.png[/img][/center]
Hothtrooper44 - Fur Collar
Earrindo - Mesh used as a base for the collar
